title: 2021 Sprinter Cargo Van
disclaimer: Available only to qualified customers on a 2021 Sprinter Cargo Van through Mercedes-Benz Financial Services at participating authorized Mercedes-Benz dealers through November 30, 2022. Not everyone will qualify. Advertised 48 months lease payment based on MSRP of $44,330 less the suggested dealer contribution of $3,103 and MBUSA Lease Cash of $1,500 resulting in a total gross capitalized cost of $39,727. Dealer sets the final price. Dealer’s contribution may vary and could affect your actual lease payment. Includes Destination Charge and optional [Package or Equipment]. Excludes title, taxes, registration, license fees, insurance, dealer prep and additional options. Total monthly payments equal $27,312. Cash due at signing includes $6,487 capitalized cost reduction, $295 acquisition fee and first month’s lease payment of $569. Your acquisition fee may vary by dealership. The acquisition fee charged by the dealer may affect the total cash due at signing. No security deposit required. Total payments equal $29,491. At lease end, lessee pays for any amounts due under the lease, any official fees and taxes related to the scheduled termination, excess wear and use plus $0.15/mile over 60,000 miles, and $595 vehicle turn-in fee. Purchase option at lease end for $17,732 plus taxes (and any other fees and charges due under the applicable lease agreement) in example shown. Subject to credit approval. Specific vehicles are subject to availability and may have to be ordered. See participating dealer for details. Offer not valid in Puerto Rico.
adds_info: Take advantage of this special lease offer on a 2021 Sprinter Cargo Van of $569/month for 48 months.

title: 2021 Mercedes-Benz ExpertSOLUTIONS Incentive Package
disclaimer: Get up to $2,000 off any 2021/2022 Sprinter (excluding Cab Chassis) when you purchase any package through the Mercedes-Benz ExpertSOLUTIONS program!Offer valid only to qualified customers with purchase of 2021/2022 Sprinter Vans (excluding Cab Chassis) not from new dealer stock. Mercedes-Benz ExpertSOLUTIONS program vehicles are custom, special-order vehicles modified by the Mercedes-Benz ExpertSOLUTIONS provider chosen by you (Including Auto Truck Group, Knapheide and Transit Works). Offer does not apply to Fleet vehicles. Customers who purchase are able to get up to $2,000 cash toward any Mercedes-Benz ExpertSOLUTIONS Packages for Sprinter (excluding Cab Chassis). Exclusions may apply. MBUSA reserves the right to terminate, revise, or amend the program in its sole business discretion. Please see your authorized Mercedes-Benz dealer for details. Offer ends November 30, 2022.
adds_info: For a limited time, get up to $2,000 back on your complete vehicle package.

title: 2022 Sprinter Van
disclaimer: Only valid on new 2022/2023 Mercedes-Benz Sprinter and Metris Vans. Qualified commercial customers only. 7.19% APR financing for 24-60 months. Available only at participating authorized Mercedes-Benz Vans dealers through Mercedes-Benz Financial Services (MBFS). Must take delivery of vehicle by November 30, 2022. Specific vehicles are subject to availability and may have to be ordered. Subject to credit approval by MBFS. Actual rates, terms, down payment, and program eligibility will be determined by MBFS Credit Team based upon creditworthiness of customer. Program rates or terms may be changed or the program may be terminated at any time at the sole discretion of MBFS. See your authorized Mercedes-Benz Vans dealer for complete details on this and other finance offers. Offer valid through November 30, 2022.

Specific vehicles are subject to availability and may have to be ordered. Subject to credit approval by MBFS. Actual rates, terms, down payment, and program eligibility will be determined by MBFS Credit Team based upon creditworthiness of customer. Program rates or terms may be changed or the program may be terminated at any time at the sole discretion of MBFS. See your authorized Mercedes-Benz Vans dealer for complete details on this and other finance offers. Offer valid through November 30, 2022.
adds_info: For a limited time, take advantage of 7.19% Fleet Special APR on all new 2022 Mercedes-Benz Metris Vans. Offer valid through November 30, 2022.
custom_HTML: Get 7.19% Fleet Special APR for 24-60 months
